5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘If you pray after Friday, then pray four (Rak’ah).’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer after Friday
